content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary Smith, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for showing interest in the apartment. Before we discuss the rental price, could you please tell me more about your needs and expectations?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student, I want a small apartment. The apartment is 25 square meters and I want to rent it for the lowest price possible. I am a responsible and dependable tenant. I want to be on good terms with the landlord.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for sharing that information. Based on the 25 square meter size of the apartment and your desire for a low rental price, I would suggest a rental rate of €500 per month. This price takes into account the cost of utilities and other expenses associated with renting an apartment in Munich. As a responsible and dependable tenant, I believe you would make a great fit for the apartment. I would be happy to discuss any additional terms or conditions that you may have questions about.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: That sounds fair. I agree to the price of 500 Euro. Thank you for the opportunity to rent the apartment. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for accepting the rental price of €500 per month. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement or moving into the apartment. I look forward to welcoming you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
